Text:
Title....: 3000 Miles
IMDb......: http://imdblight.com/id/aGseMXhiMgBifXQE-3000_Miles
Genre....: Documentary
Year.....: 2007
Rating...: 2.7/10 with 17 ratings
Plot.....: Tony Hawk and the stars of MTVs 'Jackass' race 3000 miles around the world from London to Los Angeles in just 8 days against 120 supercars in the famous Gumball 3000 Rally. '3000 Miles' follows the action, adventure and Jackass style antics along the way, with fast driving, crashes and sabotage adding to the drama and mayhem. Burt Reynolds eat your heart out!
Runtime..: 105 minutes
Filmed in: USA
Language.: English
